description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides seamless integration with Mingdao platform APIs, enabling AI applications to perform operations like worksheet management, record manipulation, and role management through natural language.

PORT.description: HTTP port for the server (default is 3001)

MINGDAO_HOST.description: Custom host URL (e.g., https://your-domain.com). If provided, API calls will use host/api instead of https://api.mingdao.com

name: Hap MCP Server
